38:       if work = get_work

40:         do_work(work)

logger()

[Source]

    # File lib/rude_q/worker.rb, line 47
47:     def logger
48:       unless @logger
49:         @logger = Logger.new(RAILS_ROOT + "/log/#{self.class.to_s.underscore}_#{RAILS_ENV}.log")
50:         class << @logger
51:           def format_message(severity, timestamp, progname, msg)
52:             "#{timestamp.strftime('%Y%m%d-%H:%M:%S')} (#{$$}) #{msg}\n"
53:           end
54:         end
55:       end
56:       return @logger
57:     end
